mapper.insert: insert into ecs_delivery_goods (rec_id, delivery_id, goods_id, product_id, product_sn, goods_name, brand_name, goods_sn, is_real, extension_code, parent_id, send_number, goods_attr) values (#{rec_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delivery_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{product_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{product_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goods_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goods_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_real,jdbcType=BIT}, #{extension_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{send_number,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{goods_attr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
